name: The CVRTER
description:
Introducing the CVRTER Series. Paying homage to the man who put Toronto Basketball on the map and planted seeds in the hearts of young Canadian ballers.

Though every individual has the right to form their own opinion about VC – The facts are Black & White. VC put up superstar numbers, provided highlights game in and game out, earned several accolades en route and took clutch moments head-on. His jersey may or may not be retired by the Toronto Raptors, but he has a place in the hearts of millions of basketball fans across Toronto and across the world and we want this piece to be a tribute to his success as a Raptor.

The design concept of this shirt was inspired by some elements of sports art as well as current fashion industry trends. Check out the breakdown of this shirt below:

Front Side:
The front side of the shirt showcases the iconic number, “15″ big and bold on the left side of the chest. Below written is, “MCMXCVIII-MMIV” which is 1998-2004 in roman numerals; stating the years VC was a Toronto Raptor. Accompanying the bold left chest design is 4 stars that border the bottom of the shirt and is a significant graphic across all sports signifying excellence.

Left Sleeve:
Re-created Signature, “VC 15″ design that he had on his left elbow sweat band.

Right Sleeve-Accolades/Accomplishments:
•	1999 Rookie of the Year
•	8x All-Star
•	2000 Olympic Gold Medalist (USA)
•	Slam-Dunk Championship

Back Side:
The back side takes on the Jersey element part of this piece. It has the traditional name plate(CVRTER) and big/bold Jersey number (15) along with the FY logo bordering the neck.

name: #RideTheRocket Custom Elite Sock x Socks & Handles
description:
Forever Yonge x Socks & Handles collaborate on a new series of Toronto inspired Elite Socks (Basketball)

#RideTheRocket theme is clearly inspired by Toronto’s Subway’s system. Its also features a custom 416 logo along the ankle sleeve and the word “TORONTO” written in Camouflage on the top lip of the Elite Sock.

Be sure to check out socksandhandles.bigcartel.com to get your custom pair of Elite Socks. Your #1 source for Custom Elite Socks in Canada!

name: Black Heather "Toronto" Hoodie
description:
TORONTO + FY LOGO on FRONT
416 Logo on sleeve just above left cuff.

The Sweaters are a 50/50 Blend (50% Cotton/50% Polyester) 

Available in Small-XLarge

General idea of sizes:

Small - 20" wide & 27" in Length
Medium - 22" wide & 28" in Length
Large - 24" wide & 29" in Length
X-Large - 24* wide & 30" in Length



ALSO available with Black lettering on Oxford Grey Hoodie
